name: Ming-Song Chen 0001
content: 软件工程学院 教师个人主页 English 返回首页 欢迎登录 导航 个人资料 个人概况 研究方向 招生与培养 开授课程 科研项目 学术成果 荣誉及奖励 陈铭松 职称： 教授 直属机构： 学科： 相关教师 个人资料 部门： 软件工程学院 性别： 男 专业技术职务： 教师 毕业院校： University of Florida 学位： 博士 学历： 研究生 联系电话： 02162235116 电子邮箱： mschen@sei.ecnu.edu.cn 办公地址： 数学馆东207 通讯地址： MathBuilding E207, East China Nornal University (Zhongshan Campus) 邮编： 200062 传真： 教育经历 1：2006.6-2010.6 University of Florida 计算机科学 博士2：2003.9-2006.6 南京大学 计算机科学与技术 硕士3：1999.9-2003.6 南京大学计算机科学与技术 本科 工作经历 1：2021.1 至今    软硬件协同设计与应用教育部工程研究中心  主任2：2015.12 至今   华东师范大学软件工程学院 教授3：2010.7-2015.12  华东师范大学软件学院 副教授 个人简介 个人简介(CV.pdf)陈铭松2003年与2006年分别获得南京大学计算机科学与技术专业本科与硕士学位，2010年获得美国佛罗里达大学计算机博士学位。2010年加入华东师范大学软件学院，2015年获教授职称。主要研究方向为信息物理融合系统设计自动化、芯片形式化验证方法与技术、可信人工智能、智能系统软硬件协同设计与优化。在嵌入式系统与云计算顶级期刊与会议如IEEE TC、IEEE TCAD、IEEE TPDS、CODES+ISSS、DAC、DATE、ECCV、RTSS、IJCAI、ISCA、Neurips上发表论文近200篇，获批软件著作权20余项，申请/获批专利30余项。主持完成包括国家重点研发计划项目与自然科学基金委重点项目在内的省部级项目9项。出版英文专著2部（其中一本被翻译为俄文版本）、中文专著1部、中文教材1本、英文教材1本。2009年与2013年曾两次获得国际重要会议“国际VLSI设计大会”与“国际嵌入式大会”最佳论文提名。相关成果获得上海市科技进步特等奖（排名第三）、NASAC青年软件创新奖、上海市教学成果奖二等奖两项（2022排名第一、2017排名第五）。目前担任计算机领域期权威期刊IEEE Transactions on Computers副主编，担任过国际会议TASE 2021大会共同主席、SLIP 2019程序委员会共同主席、ESWeek 2022本地组织共同主席，以及第20届全国嵌入式系统大会大会主席。目前担任中国计算机协会嵌入式专委会副主任、上海市计算机协会物联网专委会副主任，是中国计算机协会杰出会员、IEEE高级会员、上海计算机协会YOCSEF学术委员（2018-2020副主席、2017-2018学术秘书）、中国计算机学会系统软件专委会与形式化方法专委会委员。担任包括嵌入式著名会议DAC、DATE、ESWeek、RTSS在内的20余个国际会议的技术委员会委员，担任过30余个著名期刊会议的审稿人，以及国家自然科学基金委重点项与面上项目的评阅人。Biography(CV.pdf)Mingsong Chen is a full Professor in the Software Engineering Institute (SEI) at the East China Normal University (ECNU). Currently he serves as the director of Engineering Research Center of SW/HW Co-Design and Application, Ministry of Education, China. His research interests include design automation of intelligent cyber physical systems, formal verification of SoC,trustworthy AI, AIoT modeling and verification, cloud/edge computing, computer architecture, and software engineering. He received his B.S. and M. Eng. from Nanjing University in 2003 and 2006 respectively, and Ph.D. from the University of Florida, in 2010 - all in Computer Science. Prof. Chen is a Senior Member of IEEE, a Distinguished Member of CCF, and a member of ACM.Call for Papers:1：Embedded Systems Week,(ESweek 2024)2：International Conference on Embedded and Real-Time Computing Systems and Application,(RTCSA 2024) 社会兼职 Editorial Activity:[1] Associate Editor of IEEE Transactions on Computers (TC), 2025 - present[2] Associate Editor of Journal of Circuits, Systems and Computers (JCSC), 2013 - present[3] Associate Editor of IET Computers & Digital Techniques (CDT), 2016 - 2024 Organizing Committee:[1] Local Chair: International Conference on Data Mining (ICDM 2023) [2] Co-local Arrangement Chair: Embedded Systems Week (ESWeek 2022) [3] Program Chair: 20th National CCF Embedded Systems Techinical Conference (ESTC2022) [4] Program Co-Chair: Theoretical Aspects of Software Engineering Conference (TASE 2021) [5] Technical Program Co-Chair: International Workshop on System-Level Interconnect Prediction (SLIP 2019) [6] Publicity Chair: IEEE Real-Time Systems Symposium (RTSS 2019) [7] Publicity Chair: International Conference on Embedded Software and Systems (ICESS 2019) [8] Track Chair: International Conference on VLSI Design (VLSID'19)[9] Organizing Chair: CCF Embedded Systems Technical Conference (ESTC 2016)[10] Organizing Chair: Microsoft Research Asia-ECNU Verified Software Symposium 2012  Technical Program Committee Member:[1] Design Autoamtion Conference (DAC'19-22, 24)[2] International Conference on Hardware/Software Codesign and System Synthesis (CODES+ISSS'24)[3] International Symposium on Dependable Software Engineering Theories, Tools and Applications (SETTA'19)[4] International Conference on Embedded and Real-Time Computing Systems and Applications (RTCSA'19,24) [5] International Conference on Formal Methods and Models for System Design (MEMOCODE'18-19)[6] International Workshop on Advances in IoT Architecture and Systems (AIoTAS'17-19)[7] National Conference on Formal Methods and Applications (FMAC '16-19)[8] Design Autoamtion and Test in Europe (DATE'14-16,19-23)[9] International Conference on VLSI Design (VLSID'14-15,18-19)[10] ACM Symposium on Applied Computing (SAC'11-23)[11] Australasian Symposium on Parallel and Distributed Computing (AusPDC17) [12] Embedded System Technical Conference of CCF (ESTC'16-18). [13] Microsoft Reasearch Asia Verified Software, 2012.[14] International Workshop on  Formal methOds for Real-time Distributed Systems (FORDS’12)[15] International Conference on Contemporary Computing (IC3)‚ 2010.[16] International Conference on Formal Engineering Methods (ICFEM)‚ 2010.Reviewer:[1] International Conference on Hardware/Software Codesign and System Synthesis  (CODES+ISSS)‚ 2007‚ 2008‚ 2009, 2012.[2]  International Conference on VLSI Design (VLSI Design)‚ 2007‚ 2008‚ 2009‚ 2010[3]  ACM Great Lakes Symposium on VLSI (GLSVLSI)‚ 2009[4]  IEEE Computer Society Annual Symposium on VLSI (ISVLSI)‚ 2009[5]  Design Automation Conference (DAC)‚ 2009-2016[6]  Asia and South Pacific Design Automation Conference (ASP-DAC)‚ 2010.[7]  Design Automation & Test in Europe (DATE)‚ 2010-2016[8] The International Conference on Computer-Aided Design (ICCAD), 2012[9]  Journal of Electronic Testing[10]  ACM Transactions on Design Automation of Electronic Systems[11] IEEE Design & Test of Computers[12] IEEE Transactions on Computers[13] IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems[14] ACM Transactions on Cyber-Physical Systems[15] Frontiers of Computer Science in China[16] Journal of Systems and Software[17] 软件学报[18] 计算机学报 研究方向 主要研究方向为信息物理融合系统设计自动化、多模态嵌入式计算、可信人工智能、软硬件协同设计与优化、形式化方法与技术、计算机体系结构、物联网技术、智能教育信息技术。News:1：One paper got accepted by DATE 2026.2：One paper got accepted by ICDE 2026.3：One paper got accepted by IEEE TC 2025.4: One paper got accepted by NeurIPS 2025.5: One paper got accepted by SIGMOD 2026.Current Students:Ph.D. Students1: Xiao Du (2022 -
